channel.title: I wan't to help you translate
channel.description: Hello, I'm a Danish person and I would like to help you translate anything to Danish. How do I get started with this? :)

item.title: I wan't to help you translate
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Thank you very much. How would you like to be contacted?

Have a nice day,

Ego

item.title: I wan't to help you translate
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

nice to meet you. I’ve actually created a pretty long guide on how to translate the wiki, you may find it here: https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,1741.0.html If you have any questions, don’t hessitate to ask.

Have a nice day,

Ego
